sections.heading: Use of fictitious business names
sections.text: Prohibitions and exceptions. Penalty. Unfair trade practices.Section 35-1a. - Transacting business under assumed or fictitious name prohibited. Application for and issuance of trade name certificate.Section 35-1b. - Renewal or cancellation of trade name certificate.
